messages: f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:17): Is there an html5 C parser yet
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:17): I don't see it listed in http://esw.w3.org/topic/HTMLAsSheAreSpoke
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:18): f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb - no C parser yet
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:18): ah thanks Mike
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:18): Sam Ruby says he is willing to work on making one, only if others agree to help maintain it
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:18): That would be definitely great to have one
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:19): I wonder how long it would take
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:20): http://esw.w3.org/topic/HTMLAsSheAreSpoke  this page should be reorganized to show html5 implementations separated from the rest
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:20): I will edit it a bit
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:21): f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb - ask Sam (sruby, I think) over on #whatwg next time you see him on there
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:23): I think the amount of time it will take will depend mostly on how soon others step forward to take Sam up on his offer to work on it together
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:26): hmmm how much sometimes I prefer rdf to html for lists you can sort and rearrange on the spot
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:26): ok I reorganized the list http://esw.w3.org/topic/HTMLAsSheAreSpoke#preview
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:27): ok I reorganized the list http://esw.w3.org/topic/HTMLAsSheAreSpoke
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:35): f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb - there is a standing ban about saying anything good about RDF on this channel
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:35): please respect that ban
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:35): if you want to say anything bad, though
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:35): then go ahead
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:36): anything bad about RDF, even if you don't know what the hell you are talking about, that is welcome here
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:37): comparisons to the Spanish Inquisition are also encouraged
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:37): squeeze those in whenever you can
139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884 (08:38): RDF is communism
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:40): 139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884 - RDF if worse than communism. It is counterrevolutionary Trotskyism
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:41): anybody who believes it is good needs to go the reeducation gulag to be de-brainwashed
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:41): 139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884, there is only american people who think that communism is a dangerous word. ;)
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:42): I was about to say that...
139513027e8e90b5582cbc68fc733884 (08:43): I would prefer RDF to communism

f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:43): people from actual past and current communist countries know the meaning of power abuse
f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:43): still it doesn't make the word dangerous
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:45): I don't think you need to be from a communist country to know the meaning of power abuse

f47636673b14c54021a69dc06f6a19fb (08:46): for west european countries, communism has never been an issue and even more a symbol to fight against some right-wing movements. Franco (Spain), Nazi occupation in France, etc.  It helps to achieve of lot of social laws in France. etc etc etc. There are always more than one side.
a9b326df4e6da61c5b6f5e1058be83a2 (08:46): I think Dick Cheney is giving USA people a good lesson in that for the last few years
